Description: A beautiful Tom Anderson Classic Strat...Plays and sounds incredible..Includes the new SF1 pickups and his most popular H2+ bridge pickup..See thru transparent purple finish on a swamp ash body..Gorgeous caramel maple neck (this is TA's roasted neck..this drying process removes humidity and makes more stable)...Locking tuners...Sunken Floyd Rose...Buzz Feiten Tuning System and much more...Includes his hard shell case and case candy..Specs follow: Neck: Caramel Maple with Rosewood FingerboardNeck Shape: Even TaperNeck Finish: SatinNut Width: 1 11/16Frets: Stainless Steel HeavyBody: Swamp AshBridge: Sunken Floyd RoseTuners: Locking TunersPickups: SF1-SF1-H2+Switching: 5 Way Add Bridge with Splitter Switching The guitar weighs 7.0 lbs which is very lightweight..I have a TA hollow strat that weighs 6.14 lbs...Also has less than 10 hrs playing time and has only been played in a smoke free home. Any questions dont hesitate to ask...Item will be professionally packed and fully insured..Sales to the Continental 48 US States.
Title: 2018 Tom Anderson Electric Guitar- Classic Strat (Transparent Purple)
